Buena Park Junior High Teacher Recognized for Inspiring Students

div.div: Career Technical Educator Shelley Andros' inspiring spirit has nabbed her a spot on the 2020 Top 10 Educators of Orange County list by Parenting OC Magazine.
Buena Park School District inspires and ignites all students to pursue high achievement; empowering them to follow their passions.

Welcome to the Buena Park School District! We are excited to serve as partners in supporting students and families and we look forward to another successful school year. We highly encourage and expect parents and community members to be engaged in our schools as partners in educating our students. On behalf of the Board of Education, all BPSD employees, and myself, I thank you in advance for your continuous support. It is my highest honor to be serving the students and families of the Buena Park School District, and I look forward to celebrating the many achievements with you as we work together to build a better tomorrow for all!

Under the leadership of Superintendent of Schools, Dr. Ramon Miramontes., the Superintendent's Office oversees all District divisions, departments, and operations. For more information, call (714)736-4241
"BPSD inspires and ignites all students to pursue high achievement; empowering them to follow their passions "
